Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.jsmap

JavaScript based map client - server architecture.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
JSONBuffer Helper class to produce JSON output.
JSONResultHandler Handle results by serving them via a web server to mapping applications.
JSONResultHandler.Parameterizer Parameterization class
JSONWebServer A simple web server to serve data base contents to a JavaScript client.
 

Enum Summary
JSONBuffer.ops Operations on the stack.
 

Exception Summary
JSONBuffer.JSONException Class to represent JSON encoding exceptions.
